message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a bit more
You can do better than that, Alice!
You're getting too greedy, I'll give you a bit more, but not that much!
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
I'm not going to give in, you're going to have to make a better offer!
Last chance, Alice, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down, you're going to have to do better!
This is my final offer, take it or we'll go to the bank!
I'm not going to back down, I'll take it to the bank!
